nodes.name: Core Uplink
nodes.desc: Unlock the Protocol Grid.

nodes.name: Targeting Drills I
nodes.desc: Focus lasts longer.

nodes.name: Targeting Drills II
nodes.desc: Focus lasts longer.

nodes.name: Kill Order
nodes.desc: Focus lasts much longer, but focus switch has a short lockout.

nodes.name: Signal Beacons I
nodes.desc: Rally lasts longer.

nodes.name: Signal Beacons II
nodes.desc: Rally lasts longer.

nodes.name: Battle Standard
nodes.desc: Rally lasts much longer and grants a small speed burst while active.

nodes.name: Kinetic Boots I
nodes.desc: Dash cooldown reduced.

nodes.name: Kinetic Boots II
nodes.desc: Dash cooldown reduced.

nodes.name: Phase Runner
nodes.desc: Dash cooldown reduced further, but dash distance slightly reduced.

nodes.name: Tactical Spacing I
nodes.desc: Squad follows rally more aggressively.

nodes.name: Tactical Spacing II
nodes.desc: Squad follows rally more aggressively.

nodes.name: On Your Six
nodes.desc: Squad keeps up during dash even better.

nodes.name: Capacitor Banks I
nodes.desc: Preps Overclock. Slightly reduces Overclock cooldown.

nodes.name: Capacitor Banks II
nodes.desc: Preps Overclock. Increases Overclock duration.

nodes.name: Overclock Protocol
nodes.desc: Unlocks an active ability: press Q to Overclock. Grants a burst of squad speed + attack speed.

nodes.name: Overclock Tuning
nodes.desc: Overclock cooldown reduced further.

nodes.name: Adrenal Surge
nodes.desc: Overclock grants more move speed but slightly less attack speed.

nodes.name: Barrage Mode
nodes.desc: Overclock grants more attack speed but slightly less duration.

nodes.name: Arc Discharge
nodes.desc: Overclock activation damages nearby enemies (tradeoff: slightly longer cooldown).

nodes.name: Hunter Protocol
nodes.desc: While Overclock is active, focus-fire becomes much stronger.

nodes.name: Lethal Voltage
nodes.desc: While Overclock is active, squad deals more damage.
